segments.text: Mom , what were movies like when you were a kid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything about them was different , even the theaters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm really interested . Tell me about them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , where I grew up , we saw movies at a drive-in theater in our car with the whole family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's cool . I bet you could bring your own food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We did . On hot days , we'd take a blanket and lay in the back of dad's old pickup to watch the movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't we do that anymore ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the weather might have some influence , during bad weather the theater didn't make a whole lot .
segments.speaker: S2
